title: Lady beware
creator_credit: Julian Films, Julian Bercovici and Bruce Kerner
brief_description: Dramatizes the four basics of personal safety against criminal attack, showing how to secure oneself, avoid danger, knowing when to flee and engage an attacker. Based on the advice of experts in personal safety. Narrated by Shirley Jones.
creator_credit_for_label: Julian Films, Julian Bercovici and Bruce Kerner
